content: rainbow wave cowl materials needed yarn weight bulky main color mc approx 120 yards example uses loops & threads impressions in blue raspberry contrast color cc approx 105 yards this is the color of the purl ridges example uses loops & threads impressions in saltwater taffy scrap yarn for provisional cast-on size 10 needles or correct size for gauge gauge 13 stitches x 20 row = 4 square but it s a cowl so gauge isn t exactly vital instructions note carry the yarn up along the edge when you switch between colors no need to cut the yarn between row provisional cast-on cast on 51 stitches set-up row with mc purl all pattern repeat 31 times or until you get the length you want row 1 rs with cc k2tog x 3 yo k yo x5 k2tog x 3 x 3 row 2 ws with cc knit all row 3 rs with mc knit all row 4 ws with mc purl all end with row 3 and graft using kitchener stitch or your preferred method to the starting stitches now you have a cowl variation for a smaller child-size cowl cast on 34 stitches and repeat pattern 25 times credit to drops studio for the basic wave knitting pattern https // www garnstudio com/video php id=107&lang=us
